# Data transformation

## Read Data

With carefully designed queries, we can pull down relatively clean data.

```{r}
#install.packages("RSocrata")
library("RSocrata") # read data using API
license = read.socrata("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/ptev-4hud.json?$where=start_date between '2017-01-01' and '2021-05-01' and city='NEW YORK'")
str(license)
```


```{r}
business = read.socrata("https://data.cityofnewyork.us/resource/w7w3-xahh.json?$where=lic_expir_dd between '2020-01-01' and '2021-05-01' and address_state='NY' and license_status='Active'")
str(business)
```
